thread.title: Sony Xperia Z5 Dual Z5 Premium Dual Officially Introduced in India
thread.title_full: Sony Xperia Z5 Dual and Z5 Premium Dual Officially Introduced in India - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Sony Xperia Z5 Dual Z5 Premium Dual Officially Introduced in India
text: Sony Mobile India has just announced the Xperia Z5 lineup will be available for purchase in India beginning this week. The Xperia Z5 Dual will be the first to go on sale on October 23, while the Xperia Z5 Premium Dual should hit shelves on November 7. Both smartphones are available for pre-order in Graphite Black, Gold, Green and Chrome color options. Customers who wish to buy the Xperia Z5 Dual will have to come up with Rs 52,990 upfront, which is about $810 or €715. ... »
